elements.name: Verify user lands on the NDTV home page

steps.name: user navigates to the NDTV home page
user should be able to validate whether the NDTV logo is displaying or not

elements.name: Verfiy user clicks the Weather link in the NDTV home page

steps.name: user navigates to the NDTV home page
user should be able to click on the WEATHER link

elements.name: Verfiy user checks the weather details of a city

steps.name: user navigates to the NDTV home page
user should be able to click on the WEATHER link
user enters the Bengaluru and checks if it is displayed and selected
user verifies that the Bengaluru is available on the map and clicks on it to display the weather details
user saves the temperature in degrees

name: Validate the weather details of a city

elements.name: Verfiy user checks the weather details of a city

steps.name: User passes cityname Bengaluru and appid 7fe67bf08c80ded756e598d6f8fedaea to the Request URI.
